description:
The `Card` component is a sheet of material that serves as an entry point to
more detailed information. A card could contain a photo, text, and a link
about a single subject.

The `Card` component also defines `contextTypes` for checking if the `Card`
is expanded. The expander icon can have a tooltip and be changed through
props. If the card is not expanded, the children components will not be
visible until it has been toggled.

className.description: An optional className to apply to the card.

children.description: Any Card parts that should be rendered.

iconClassName.description: The icon className to use for the expander icon.

iconChildren.description: Any icon children required for the expander icon.

initiallyExpanded.description:
Boolean if the card is initially expanded when there is an expander
component.

raise.description: Boolean if the card should raise on hover when on a desktop display.

isExpanded.description:
Boolean if the card is currently expanded. This will require the `onExpanderClick` function
to toggle the state. The card will become controlled if this is not `undefined`.

onExpanderClick.description: An optional function to call when the expander is clicked.

expanderTooltipPosition.description: The tooltip position for the expander icon.

expanderTooltipLabel.description: The optional tooltip to display for the expander icon.
